0010011010111001 1010010100001011 1 -> sum: 1100101111000101, cout: 0
1101000100101101 0001001100100001 1 -> sum: 1110010001001111, cout: 0
0011001001110000 0000000110111100 1 -> sum: 0011010000101101, cout: 0
1001001110111101 1010101111001111 0 -> sum: 0011111110001100, cout: 1
1100011101011101 1010100111011011 0 -> sum: 0111000100111000, cout: 1
0001101000000001 0010110000010011 1 -> sum: 0100011000010101, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
